message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fair deal. You'll lose 5% of the value if we go to the next round.
I understand the inflation puts pressure on us, but my offer in the previous round was already generous. I'm willing to meet you halfway at 55/45, but that's my final offer.
Since you said 55/45 was your final offer, I'll assume you're not willing to compromise further. Given the inflation, I think 60/40 is a reasonable counteroffer.
Bob, let's be realistic. The inflation is working against me, but dragging this out doesn't benefit either of us.  I propose a 50/50 split. It's the fairest option and avoids further losses for me.
